{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = T-Com |model = Sinus 154 data |submodelappend = yes |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = II |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = corded adapter
|vendor_id = 083a |device_id = 4531 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:30:F1
|chip1 = Intersil;ISL3887; |chip2 = Intersil;; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Accton |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The [http://hilfe.telekom.de/hsp/cms/content/HSP/de/3388/FAQ/theme-2000178/DSL-Geraete/theme-66139236/T-Sinus-Serie/theme-2001151/T-Sinus-154-Serie/theme-2001394/Sinus-154-data-II Windows Driver (DE)] has two USB ID entries in the INF file. :083a:4511 (UsbVariant 8832, ISL3886) :083a:4531 (UsbVariant 14471, ISL3887)
Per [http://wiki.ubuntuusers.de/WLAN/Karten/T-Sinus ubuntuusers.de], this device uses the 083a:4531 ID.

[http://mandriva.598463.n5.nabble.com/Bug-25714-ndiswrapper-UNCONFIRMED-ndiswrapper-not-getting-started-at-boottime-td878902.html 00:30:F1 OUI]
